name: DG Minigolf
description:
Welcome to DG Minigolf!

This is a 2d, top-down minigolf game, where you can try your best on 18 different courses! 
Play alone, or beat your friends in a 2-Player-HotSeat-Session! 
Try to get better and better and beat your own Highscore!

Features:

  • 18 Minigolf courses
  • Single- and Multiplayer
  • Highscore
  • Screenshots
  • Simple Control

Have Fun!
